name: Adarsh Vishwakarma
bio: Web Dev | Web-Scraping | Deep Learning | Computer Vision | Hacking devices |

top_projects.name: Portfolio
top_projects.description: A simple portfolio page built using Aeternity, Shadcn, and Tailwind CSS, fetching data from a Neon database connected via Prisma ORM. It includes an admin page for managing content.

top_projects.name: clockify
top_projects.description: A Smart Clock with NodeMCU and OLED display featuring time, task management, alarms, timers, task notifications, and Wi-Fi connectivity for enhanced productivity, all controlled using a LocalNetwork Control Console on any browser.

top_projects.name: infybroker
top_projects.description: a broker app with infinite time duration

adarshx01/comingsoon.summary: Recent activities in the adarshx01/comingsoon repository include multiple push events on December 8, 2024, focusing on fine-tuning the project with changes such as reducing image size, fixing the vote button, and modifying text. These frequent updates suggest active development and refinement of the project.

adarshx01/clockify.summary: The adarshx01/clockify repository saw significant activity on December 26, 2024, with several push events aimed at updating the README.md file and adding new files, indicating initial setup and introduction of key features to the project.

profile_summary:
Adarsh Vishwakarma is a highly skilled and accomplished developer with a strong foundation in programming languages such as TypeScript, C++, and JavaScript. With a keen interest in web development, web-scraping, deep learning, and computer vision, Adarsh has established himself as a versatile and innovative professional in the field of technology. His expertise in hacking devices has also earned him recognition as a skilled problem solver and out-of-the-box thinker. As a web dev expert, Adarsh is well-versed in creating efficient and scalable solutions that meet the demands of modern web applications.

With a substantial following of 71 professionals and a portfolio of 73 public repositories, Adarsh has demonstrated his commitment to active development and collaboration. His strong online presence and technical contributions have positioned him as a reliable and knowledgeable expert in his domain. By leveraging his technical skills and expertise, Adarsh continues to drive innovation and deliver high-quality solutions that meet the evolving needs of the tech industry. As a seasoned developer with a passion for learning and growth, Adarsh is always looking to expand his skill set and stay up-to-date with the latest advancements in programming languages, deep learning, and computer vision, making him a valuable asset to any organization or project.
